content: यशस् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अश् स्तुतौ असुन् धातोः युट् च <ls>Uṇ. 4. 190</ls>] {@--1@} Lovely, agreeable, worthy. {@--2@} Honoured. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} Fame, reputation, glory, renown; विस्तीर्यते यशो लोके तैलबिंदुरिवांभसि <ls>Ms. 7. 34</ls>; यशस्तु रक्ष्यं परतो यशोधनैः <ls>R. 3. 48</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 40</ls> {@--3@} An object of glory or respect, a person of distinction. {@--4@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Beauty, splendour. {@--5@} Favour, partiality. {@--6@} Wealth. {@--7@} Food. {@--8@} Water.
